Operators Package

Submodules

plugins.operators.data_quality module

Defines the DataQualityOperator class to execute the RedshiftChecker with the rules specified by the JSON file. The check report is exported as a JSON string to a XCom.

class data_quality.DataQualityOperator(rules, *args, **kwargs)

This class defines the custom data quality operator to check the data inserted into the fact and dimensions tables.

execute(context)

Executes the Redshift check process and exports the resulting report to a XCom key.

Parameters

context – The task context inherited from BaseOperator.

plugins.operators.load_dimension module

Defines the LoadDimensionOperator class to execute the SQL insert statements for the dimension tables.

class load_dimension.LoadDimensionOperator(redshift_connection_id='redshift', table='', append_only=False, sql_create='', sql_insert='', *args, **kwargs)

This class defines the dimension table’s data loader operator to execute drop, create and insert statements.

execute(context)

Executes the RedshiftSQLHook for each SQL statement according to the options set by the constructor.

Parameters

context – The task context inherited from BaseOperator.

plugins.operators.load_fact module

Defines the LoadFactOperator class to execute the SQL insert statements for the fact table.

class load_fact.LoadFactOperator(redshift_connection_id='redshift', table='', append_only=False, sql_create='', sql_insert='', *args, **kwargs)

This class defines the fact table’s data loader operator to execute drop, create and insert statements.

execute(context)

Executes the RedshiftSQLHook for each SQL statement according to the options set by the constructor.

Parameters

context – The task context inherited from BaseOperator.

plugins.operators.stage_redshift module

Defines the StageToRedshiftOperator class to execute the SQL copy statements for the stage tables.

class stage_redshift.StageToRedshiftOperator(aws_credentials_id='aws_credentials', redshift_connection_id='redshift', s3_bucket='', s3_key='', table='', sql_copy='', sql_create='', *args, **kwargs)

This class defines the stage table’s data loader operator to execute drop, create and copy statements.

execute(context)

Initializes the AWS credentials using the AwsBaseHook. Executes the RedshiftSQLHook for each SQL statement according to the options set by the constructor.

Parameters

context – The task context inherited from BaseOperator.
